Mind Palace

The dashboard requires a full build to display the interactive UI. If you installed via go install, you need to build the dashboard separately. 

git clone https://github.com/koksalmehmet/mind-palace
cd mind-palace/apps/dashboard
npm install && npm run build
cd ../cli
go build -o palace .
Note: The CLI works without the dashboard. You can use all other commands like palace scan, palace explore, and palace serve (MCP server).
